name: Pig Farming
description:
Roll up your sleeves and walk into your pretty farm, take care and renovate to make it look like what you imagine. Be a hardworking farmer in the farming garden.
Improve the wild land into arable land and plant the crops you like, there are a variety of crops to choose from, short-term and long-term crops.

Build cages to take care of cute pets, take care of them until maturity.
Dig ponds, drop them, raise fish and take care of them growing day by day. Harvest seafood sold to take money to continue the new cycle.
Do not hesitate or step into the farm house to experience the life of the farmer.
Come to the City of farming to experience farmer life.
Do not hesitate or step into the farm to experience the life of the farmers.
Hey, come to the Pig Farm to become real farmers.
publishers: IDTV  Viet  Nam Development Technology And Trading Investment Joint Stock Company
